topic.title: Little Red Riding Hood
topic.shortdesc: Little Red's mother makes sure she is prepared to go into the forest and warns her to be careful in the woods.

section.title: Chapter 2: Little Red Goes Into The Woods

fig.title: Little Red Riding Hood and Her Mother

image.alt: The mother is putting Little Red Riding Hood on.

body.p: "It is starting to get late Red, so it is better if you start heading to Grandmothers house now before it gets too dark." Her mother said to little Red.
Handing Little Red her basket. "Now don't forget your hood." Her mother says handing her and helping her put on her red hood.

"Remember to be quite and quick through the forest. This hood should protect you and tell other things in the forest to stay away." Her mother tells her while finishing tying the hood around her head.

"Remember to be quite and quick through the forest. This hood should protect you and tell hungry monsters that you are poisonousness." Her mother tells her while finishing tying the hood around her head.

"Of course, mother I am always careful through the forest and nothing has happened yet on the way to grandmothers what would be different this time?" Little Red has become very confident over the year traveling to Grandmothers.

"You just always be careful no matter what. But you must go now before it gets to dark." Her mother walks her to the door and send waves her goodbye. As Little red starts her journey through the forest.
